title: Day 13 - The Man Who Watched Me Die
itunes:title: Day 13 - The Man Who Watched Me Die
itunes:subtitle: The 31 Days of Horror 2021
description:
I wish I knew why...

***

Written by Sum Gigh

***

Content warning: suicide, self-harm

***

Bonus episode: "It's Been Six Months..." written by Adam Roberts and narrated by Danielle Hewitt

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod
